query.value:
SELECT 
Account_18chr_Id__c,
Account_Number__c,
Name,
OwnerId,
Country__c,
CreatedDate,
LastModifiedDate
FROM Account

where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select max(cast (Lastmodifieddate AS datetime)) AS Modified
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Account]

select max(cast (createddate AS datetime))  AS Created
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Account]

query.value:
SELECT 
Account_18chr_Id__c,
Account_Number__c,
Name,
OwnerId,
Country__c,
CreatedDate,
LastModifiedDate
FROM Account

SELECT 
Id
,AccountId
,IST_Rep__c
,MQL_Program__c
,Product__c
,Qualify_Out_Reson__c
,Region__c
,Sales_Region__c
,MailingCountry
,Status__c
,Sub_Region__c
,FirstName
,LastName
,Email
,MTL_Datestamp__c
,MQL_Datestamp__c
,CreatedDate
,LastModifiedDate
FROM Contact 


where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select max(cast (Lastmodifieddate AS datetime)) AS Modified
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Contact]

select max(cast (createddate AS datetime))  AS Created
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Contact]

query.value:
SELECT
Id,
MQL_Datestamp__c,
MTL_Datestamp__c,
Status,
Company,
Lead_Country__c,
Title,
FirstName,
LastName,
Email,
MQL_Program__c,
Qualified_Out_Reason__c,
Status_Reason__c,
Sales_Region__c,
Sub_Region__c,
ConvertedAccountId,
CreatedDate,
LastModifiedDate
FROM Lead
where (CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z)
and (MQL_Datestamp__c!=null or MTL_Datestamp__c!=null)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select max(cast (Lastmodifieddate AS datetime)) AS Modified
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Lead]

select max(cast (createddate AS datetime))  AS Created
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Lead]

source.query:
SELECT
Id,
MQL_Datestamp__c,
MTL_Datestamp__c,
Status,
Company,
Lead_Country__c,
Title,
FirstName,
LastName,
Email,
MQL_Program__c,
Qualified_Out_Reason__c,
Status_Reason__c,
Sales_Region__c,
Sub_Region__c,
ConvertedAccountId,
CreatedDate,
LastModifiedDate
FROM Lead
where
MQL_Datestamp__c!=null or
MTL_Datestamp__c!=null

IST_Rep,
CreatedDate,
LastModifiedDate
FROM Opportunity

where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

source.query: SELECT CreatedDate,Id, Name, LastModifiedDate  FROM Profile

query.value:
select Id,Name,CreatedDate,LastModifiedDate
from Profile
where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select max(cast (Lastmodifieddate AS datetime)) AS Modified
  FROM [STG].[Sales_SFDC_Profile]

select max(cast (CreatedDate AS datetime)) AS Created
  FROM [STG].[Sales_SFDC_Profile]
